metadata.name: Potential Crypto Mining Activity
metadata.comment: Detects command line parameters or strings often used by crypto miners

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --cpu-priority=')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--donate-level=0')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -o pool.')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --nicehash')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --algo=rx/0 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('stratum+tcp://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('stratum+udp://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ls1kb25hdgutbgv2zww9')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('0tzg9uyxrllwxldmvsp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tlwrvbmf0zs1szxzlbd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c3ryyxr1bst0y3a6ly')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('n0cmf0dw0rdgnwoi8v')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zdhjhdhvtk3rjcdovl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c3ryyxr1bst1zha6ly')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('n0cmf0dw0rdwrwoi8v')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zdhjhdhvtk3vkcdovl'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' pool.c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' pool.o ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gcc -'))))

output.summary: Detects command line parameters or strings often used by crypto miners

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Legitimate use of crypto miners 2. Some build frameworks Reference: https://www.poolwatch.io/coin/monero
